text: The 1997–98 Croatian Football Cup was the seventh edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Croatia Zagreb were the defending champions, and they won their third successive title. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Round !! Main date !! Number of fixtures !! width=100 | Clubs !! October 1997, Second legs 22 October 1997|| 8 || 8 → 4 || None |- | Semi-finals || First legs 1 April 1998, Second legs 15 April 1998 || 4 || 4 → 2 || None |- | Final || First leg 6 May, Second leg 14
